Command.name: sr_dns
Command.Help: Performs several types of DNS operations.
Uses the StingRay driver if it is available.

Option.name: query
Option.Help: Query the DNS server for the information about the given hostname

Option.name: reverse
Option.Help: Query the DNS server for the information about the given IP

Option.name: zone
Option.Help: Attempt to perform a zone transfer (ie, get all DNS information) for
